activities: Any PII collected via the GlobeSmart product is collected in order to allow record of the person's activities in GlobeSmart to be available to them during subsequent visits.  These activities include: 1) Results from GlobeSmart Assessment Profile, 2) Lists of who the user has invited to take the profile, 3) Scores from Tests 4) Record of which Case Studies have been read, 5) Listing of Recently Visited Topics and 6) Site usage statistics.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Individuals with questions pertaining to our privacy policy are encouraged to email us at privacydept@aperianglobal.com.  If you do not receive acknowledgement of your inquiry or your inquiry has not been satisfactorily addressed, you should contact TRUSTe at http://www.truste.org/consumers/watchdog_complaint.php.  TRUSTe will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve your concerns.
